description:
Maximize the value of hybrid cloud in the generative AI era → https://ibm.biz/BdmLTU
Explore IBM's hybrid cloud solutions → https://ibm.biz/BdmLT7

In this video,Jamil  Spain explains the top five technologies essential for Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) success, with a deep dive into cloud databases and Database as a Service (DaaS). Learn about the fundamentals, deployment options, disaster recovery, and scalability features, empowering you to overcome SRE challenges effortlessly. 

Sign up for the cloud topic updates & keep up with the next era of hybrid multicloud solutions → https://ibm.biz/BdmLTW
title: What are Cloud Databases?
